activities.title: Soccer match
activities.description: Let's play soccer! I'm looking for people who wish play soccer on the week end generally. I can bring a ball. More we are, more fun we'll get! Hope i'll see you soon!
activities.location: Road of the soccer field, 1, 00001 SoccerLand

activities.title: Internationnal discussion
activities.description: Hi there! I'd like to improve my language skills... So I was wondering to create an event to meet people with different languages and talk to them. I already talk Italian and English. Feel free to join!

activities.title: Last Marvel Movie
activities.description: Hey! I am looking for some people FAN of marvel to come with me at the movie theater to watch the last one! Maybe after we can go to the pub to discuss about the Marvel univers...
activities.location: Road of the movie theater, 1, 00003 Movieland

activities.title: Let's practice yoga!
activities.description: Do you want to reach nirvana with me? Let's pratice together

activities.title: Trip to Milanno
activities.description: I'm going to visit Milano on 15/03/2023. If you are also interested in visiting new cities to discover culture, architeture and so more please join

activities.title: Forest camping
activities.description: I love camping in forest, making fire and eating marshmallow. If you wanna join in order to share camping skills I already have a tent.
